title: Make Get Started button functional on landing page

requirements.summary: Add click handler to Get Started button that initiates Internet Identity authentication flow
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Get Started button triggers the Internet Identity login process
After successful authentication, the user is redirected to either profile setup (if new user) or the MapView page (if existing user)
The button behavior matches the existing Login button functionality

file_operations.description: Add click handler to the Get Started button using the useInternetIdentity hook. Import and use the login function from useInternetIdentity to trigger the authentication flow when the button is clicked. Handle the disabled state during login process and add error handling that matches the Login button pattern (clearing state and retrying on 'User is already authenticated' errors). The button should integrate with the existing authentication system without changing its visual appearance or layout.
